summary: This currently makes your follower unequip their helm when not in combat. I intend to add more features and will probably release them as separate ESPs.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wished you could get your follower to wear the best helmet but still see their gorgeous face? Now you can!

Latest notes click the version number above ^^
--
[b]Features:[/b]
Adds a script to your current follower that makes them unequip their helmet whenever they leave combat.
You may need to take their current helm away and give it back to enable this functionality (but only on first run).

--
[b]Install:[/b]
Use NMM or [url=/downloads/file.php?id=1840]Wrye Bash[/url] or extract to your Skyrim/Data folder. 

--
[b]Usage:[/b]
Automatic - just give your follower a helmet ;)

--
[b]Conflicts:[/b]
This mod should not conflict with anything else - unless of course there\'s a mod that does the opposite!

--
[b]Credits:[/b]
Xetrill and Redwood Elf - who basically wrote the script for me!! (turns out to be simpler than I\'d imagined)
author: ScarabMonkey and Xetrill and Redwood Elf
